game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to the village elder.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden deep in the jungle. The village elder has tasked you with its recovery to bring prosperity back to their people.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a place of honor in the village

task.objective: Speak with the ancient oracle for clues
task.description: The oracle is said to reside in a hidden temple. Seek her wisdom to locate the artifact.
task.location: Oracle's Temple, marked by a waterfall

task.objective: Defeat the Guardian of the Jungle
task.description: The guardian protects the entrance to where the artifact is hidden. You must defeat it to proceed.
task.location: Heart of the Jungle, near a giant tree

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact from its pedestal
task.description: The artifact is on a pedestal in a chamber deep within the ancient ruins. Be careful not to trigger any traps.
task.location: Ancient Ruins, behind three secret doors
